QuestData.Title: Hidden in Plain Sight
QuestData.Description: <Reshad begins hastily stuffing scrolls into his robes.>$B$BI thought I would have more time to prepare! There are powerful relics hidden out there in Skettis - if I leave without them, I may as well have died.$B$BThe first is a pair of wingblades being held by an effigy near the front gate. You likely walked right past them on your way in.$B$BAnother effigy on the east side of the ruins bears a white mask over its face.$B$BBring those relics to me, and their secrets shall be yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Weathered Wingblades and Ragged Mask.
QuestData.CompletionText: Wingblades forged in the name of a sun god to bring freedom and glory to her children.$B$BA mask worn by a great king who would walk among his people in disguise to know their true nature.
QuestData.RewardText: Who would expect to find these treasures draped over straw dolls, left to bake in the sun? Sometimes the best place to hide precious things is in plain sight.
